mapper.select: SELECT post_id, category_id, writer, title, contents, create_date, like_num FROM post WHERE post_id IN (SELECT post_id FROM post WHERE create_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) AND NOW() GROUP BY category_id HAVING count(*) >= 1 ORDER BY like_num DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY category_id ASC
SELECT post_id, writer, title, contents,create_date, like_num FROM post WHERE category_id = #{category_id} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 100
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(category_id, title, contents) VALUES (#{category_id}, #{title}, #{contents})
